Detailed Description

abstract base class for handling requests. It implements unreliable handling of requests by randomly discarding them with the given discard probability.

Definition at line 23 of file request_handler.h.

const History &  history

constructs the RequestHandler by setting up the distribution generator with the given seed and discard probability.

Member Function Documentation

void RequestHandler::handle_request ( boost::shared_ptr< WorldInformation >  world_information,
boost::shared_ptr< const Request >  request 
)

discards the given request with the given probability. If not discarded the request is delegated to the abstract handle_request_reliable member.

Non-abstract RequestHandlers should implement handle_request_reliable

Definition at line 26 of file request_handler.cc.

Member Data Documentation

const History& RequestHandler::history_ [protected]

History may be used by inheriting classes to implement adversial behavior.
